Detailed Description

Window is a simple "whiteboard" on which you can display Idxs with for example gray_draw_matrix and RGB_draw_matrix. Warning: do not use electric fence with QT as it is unstable.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ebl::Window::Window ( int  argc,
char **  argv,
int  height = 600,
int  width = 800 
)

Be careful to create a whiteboard big enough for your pictures, since you won't be able to make it bigger after (ie resizing the window will scale the content, you won't have more space to draw on)
